Html:
Hi there,

 

This would be really handy to have a Nuget pacakge so it can be installed via nuget.

 

I notice there is Fluent version of the Task Scheduler here on codeplex which has a nuget package but appears to only run in .net 4 and i am stuck currently in 3.5

 

Just my 2 cents :-)
Thanks for the pointer. I hadn't even heard of NuGet. Nice solution. I have uploaded the 1.6 files and they are now available through NuGet.
